title: Collaborative Project Development Workshop Based on Digital Humanities

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Capacity-building program for corporate cultural planners and knowledge managers in developing humanities content using digital technologies

learning_goals: Reconstruct institutional historical materials on digital platforms (e.g., online exhibition halls) through collaborative project-based learning.
Complete the planning-development-evaluation process of a digital humanities project through role allocation among team members.
Archival materials can be reinterpreted in new formats using digital tools (metadata creation, simple web publishing).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
